attributes.action: That the British people be given an IN/OUT referendum on membership of the EU
attributes.additional_details: It is apparent that Chancelor Angela Merkel of Germany is sick of the British feeling towards Europe.  We, the British people, have had enough of her and other nations government members dictating what we, as British citizens, should do. As a nation, we should stand up to the pressure and bullying from these foreign governments and our Prime Minister and his government should be strong in their message to the EU. The government should now give the British People an IN/OUT referendum. IMMEDIATELY!
